content: {"name": "Newark School of Global Studies", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Summer meal program\nCoordinator: Keon\tLewis\t9737337170\t\nStart: 08/18/2025\tEnd: 08/22/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "24 Crane Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Seventh Avenue", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07104", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.75188350000001, "longitude": -74.1722072}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 351-5023", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
